import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import {saveShipping} from '../actions/cartActions'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; const ShippingScreen =(props) => { const [address, setAddress] = useState(''); const [city, setCity] = useState(''); const [country, setCountry] = useState(''); const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(''); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(saveShipping({address, city, postalCode, country})); props.history.push('payment'); } return (
